Plot: Santa's clumsy son Arthur gets put on a mission with St. Nick's father to give out a present they misplaced to a young girl in less than 2 hours.
Title: Arthur Christmas
Actors: James McAvoy, Hugh Laurie, Bill Nighy, Jim Broadbent
tomatoConsensus: Aardman Animations broadens their humor a bit for Arthur Christmas, a clever and earnest holiday film with surprising emotional strength.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 3 wins & 20 nominations.
